Source.Name: perl-datetime-format-strptime
Source.Summary: DateTime::Format::Strptime - Parse and format strp and strf time patterns
Source.Description: This module implements most of strptime(3), the POSIX function that is the reverse of strftime(3), for DateTime. While strftime takes a DateTime and a pattern and returns a string, strptime takes a string and a pattern and returns the DateTime object associated.

Package.Name: perl-datetime-format-strptime

Package.Description: This module implements most of strptime(3), the POSIX function that is the reverse of strftime(3), for DateTime. While strftime takes a DateTime and a pattern and returns a string, strptime takes a string and a pattern and returns the DateTime object associated.
